notes: Build 2 @other/House_aoe2DE.png@. Use the @animal/Sheep_aoe2DE.png@ to find the large @resource/BerryBushDE.png@.
Build a @mill/Mill_aoe2de.png@ on the large @resource/BerryBushDE.png@ with 1 @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ from @other/House_aoe2DE.png@.
Bring all @animal/Sheep_aoe2DE.png@ in the @mill/Mill_aoe2de.png@, after finding them.
All @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ gather from @resource/BerryBushDE.png@: next to @mill/Mill_aoe2de.png@ (2) and under @town_center/Towncenter_aoe2DE.png@ (6).
Lure the first @animal/Boar_aoe2DE.png@.
Send 2 @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ to @resource/Aoe2de_wood.png@ (straggler).
Build a @other/House_aoe2DE.png@ with one of the @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ on @resource/Aoe2de_wood.png@.
Lure the second @animal/Boar_aoe2DE.png@.
Send 2 extra @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ to @animal/Boar_aoe2DE.png@.
Build a @lumber_camp/Lumber_camp_aoe2de.png@ and send 6 @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ (new & straggler) to it.
Research @town_center/LoomDE.png@, then click up to @age/FeudalAgeIconDE.png@.
All @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ from @animal/Boar_aoe2DE.png@ go to @resource/Aoe2de_wood.png@ (straggler) once idle.
Send 6 @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ from @town_center/Towncenter_aoe2DE.png@ to build a second @lumber_camp/Lumber_camp_aoe2de.png@.
Build @barracks/Barracks_aoe2DE.png@ at 60% up, then @other/House_aoe2DE.png@ (same @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@).
Send 2 @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ from @town_center/Towncenter_aoe2DE.png@ to @resource/Aoe2de_gold.png@ (afer starting @barracks/Barracks_aoe2DE.png@).
Build 2 @archery_range/Archery_range_aoe2DE.png@ with 2 @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ (second might come a bit later).
Research @lumber_camp/DoubleBitAxe_aoe2DE.png@, start producing @archery_range/Archer_aoe2DE.png@.
Send the next @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ to @resource/Aoe2de_gold.png@.
Keep 5 @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ on each @lumber_camp/Lumber_camp_aoe2de.png@, the others go to @resource/BerryBushDE.png@.
Start seeding @mill/FarmDE.png@. Produce @archery_range/Archer_aoe2DE.png@ from the 2 @archery_range/Archery_range_aoe2DE.png@.
Use 1 @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ to build @other/House_aoe2DE.png@, @blacksmith/Blacksmith_aoe2de.png@ and @defensive_structures/Palisade_wall_aoe2de.png@.
Send the @archery_range/Archer_aoe2DE.png@ with the @stable/Aoe2de_camel_scout.png@. Research @blacksmith/FletchingDE.png@ when possible.
